skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Michael Guberti is a Social Media Strategist & founder of a full-service digital marketing agency empowering orthodontists, medical aestheticians, plastic surgeons, architects, interior designers & other industries. He is the winner of The Best Marketing Campaign of the Year Award & Rule Breaker Award for teaching entrepreneurship at an accredited business university before ever enrolling in a college. He has spoken at Microsoft, the annual ECA Fitness Conference, the Westchester Youth Summit & been featured on television shows including Verizon FiOS News.

With his brother Marc, he co-founded the nonprofit 501c3 organization Guberti Giving Inc. (GubertiGivingInc.com) supporting youth, veterans & single mothers. The nonprofit has received support from the New York Knicks, Nextiva Phone Company & other organizations.
